snippet: An analysis of the mismanagement of MF Global provides a damaging look at how the firm was pushed to collapse, but whether prosecutors have enough to pursue criminal charges is a different question.
abstract: An analysis of the mismanagement of MF Global provides a damaging look at how the firm was pushed to collapse, but whether prosecutors have enough to pursue criminal charges is a different question.

headline.main: Assessing a Case Against MF Global Executives
